SELECT nvl(max(no),0) + 1 FROM motel
INSERT INTO motel (no, mcode, mname, mregion, mdetailregion, mrating, maddress, mdetailaddress, mimage, minfo, mdaesilcheckin, mdaesilcheckout, mdaesiltime, mstaycheckin, mstaycheckout ) VALUES(#{no}, 'M', #{mname}, #{mregion}, #{mdetailregion}, 0, #{maddress}, #{mdetailaddress}, #{mimage}, #{minfo}, #{mdaesilcheckin}, #{mdaesilcheckout}, #{mdaesiltime}, #{mstaycheckin}, #{mstaycheckout} )
mapper.select: SELECT BBB.* FROM (SELECT rownum as rn, AAA.* FROM (SELECT no, mcode, mname, mregion, maddress FROM motel ORDER BY no DESC)AAA)BBB WHERE BBB.rn BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
